parameters.description: Log of COTS intrinsic growth rate (year^-1). Transformed value is ~2.0, representing population doubling in favorable conditions.
Log of COTS carrying capacity (individuals/m2). Transformed value is ~2.0, representing maximum sustainable density.
Log of COTS predation rate on slow-growing coral (m2/individual/year). Transformed value is ~0.2, representing area of slow coral consumed per COTS per year.
Log of COTS predation rate on fast-growing coral (m2/individual/year). Transformed value is ~0.5, representing area of fast coral consumed per COTS per year.
Log of COTS preference for fast-growing coral (dimensionless). Transformed value is ~2.0, indicating twice the preference for fast-growing coral compared to slow-growing coral.
Log of slow-growing coral intrinsic growth rate (year^-1). Transformed value is ~0.1, representing 10% maximum annual growth rate.
Log of fast-growing coral intrinsic growth rate (year^-1). Transformed value is ~0.5, representing 50% maximum annual growth rate.
Log of slow-growing coral carrying capacity (%). Transformed value is ~50%, representing maximum possible cover.
Log of fast-growing coral carrying capacity (%). Transformed value is ~50%, representing maximum possible cover.
Log of optimal temperature for COTS (°C). Transformed value is ~28°C, representing temperature with highest COTS growth/survival.
Log of temperature tolerance width for COTS (°C). Transformed value is ~2°C, representing width of temperature response curve.
Log of temperature threshold for coral bleaching (°C). Transformed value is ~30°C, representing temperature above which bleaching occurs.
Log of bleaching mortality rate for slow-growing coral (proportion). Transformed value is ~0.1, representing 10% mortality during bleaching events.
Log of bleaching mortality rate for fast-growing coral (proportion). Transformed value is ~0.5, representing 50% mortality during bleaching events.
Log of COTS dependency on coral for survival (dimensionless). Transformed value is ~0.1, representing strength of feedback between coral availability and COTS survival.
Log of observation error standard deviation for COTS abundance. Transformed value is ~0.2.
Log of observation error standard deviation for slow-growing coral cover. Transformed value is ~3.0.
Log of observation error standard deviation for fast-growing coral cover. Transformed value is ~3.0.
Years of observation
Observed COTS abundance (individuals/m2)
Observed slow-growing coral cover (%)
Observed fast-growing coral cover (%)
Sea surface temperature (°C)
COTS immigration rate (individuals/m2/year)
